Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ImmunoCAP Allergen Components for detection of allergen specific IgE using automated quantitative immunoassay.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative measurement of allergen specific IgE in human serum or plasma to aid in diagnosing IgE mediated allergic disorders, for use with Phadia 100, 250, and 1000 instruments in clinical laboratories.
